title: Corrie ten Boom: World War II Heroine (Heroes of the Faith)
features: For challenge and encouragement in your Christian life, read the life stories of the Heroes of the Faith. The novelized biographies of this series are inspiring and easy-to-read, ideal for Christians of any age or background. In

you’ll get to know the Dutch watchmaker whose powerful Christian faith led her to protect Jews during World War II—and carried her through the horrors of a Nazi concentration camp after her activities were discovered. Appropriate for readers from junior high through adult, helpful for believers of any background, these biographies encourage greater Christian commitment through the example of heroes like Corrie ten Boom.
description: The Heroes of the Faith series is back with newly-typeset editions of the inspiring stories of Corrie ten Boom, Amy Carmichael, Billy Graham, and David Livingstone. With more than 2 million copies sold in the series, these books are proven winners, guaranteed to challenge and encourage readers of all ages and backgrounds.
--This text refers to an out of print or unavailable edition of this title.
